org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts

Class BaseMeterChart<D extends MeterDataset>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.events.HandlerManager
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.AbstractChart
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.charts.BaseMeterChart<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Dataset type for the specific chart, extends MeterDataset
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsChart, IsDatasetCreator<D>, MutationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GaugeChart, MeterChart

    abstract class BaseMeterChart<D extends MeterDataset>
extends AbstractChart
implements IsDatasetCreator<D>
    This is an abstract meter chart, inherited by a meter and gauge charts.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULT_MAX
      Default of maximum value of data in the a dataset (percentage based), 100.0.
      private BaseMeterController meterController 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseMeterChart(Type type)
      Builds the chart.
      This is must be extended for controller which are based on this type of chart.

      Called before any drawing or reconfiguration in order that the chart which implements it can override options

      Returns the controller instance or null if chart not initialized.
